mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MATCH_RESULT_INFO (MD_NUM, TA_HOME_NUM, TA_AWAY_NUM, MR_REQUEST_STATUS) VALUES (#{mdNum}, #{taHomeNum}, #{taAwayNum}, #{mrRequestStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT MR.*, TA.TA_NAME, MD.MD_DATE, MD.MD_TIME, MD.MD_ADDRESS FROM MATCH_RESULT_INFO MR INNER JOIN TEAM_INFO TA ON TA.TA_NUM = MR.TA_AWAY_NUM INNER JOIN MATCH_DEAL_INFO MD ON MD.MD_NUM = MR.MD_NUM WHERE MR.TA_HOME_NUM = 34 ORDER BY MR.MR_REQUEST_STATUS ASC, MR_NUM
